doc.title: Rect
doc.desc: The Rect class is a class that holds rectangle information.

member.name: Rect
member.desc: Constructs an object of the Rect class.

member.name: Rect

argitem.name: left
argitem.desc: Specifies the left edge.

argitem.name: top
argitem.desc: Specifies the top edge.

argitem.name: right
argitem.desc: Specifies the right edge.

argitem.name: bottom
argitem.desc: Specifies the bottom edge.

member.desc: Constructs a Rect class object with the specified size.

member.name: Rect

argitem.name: src
argitem.desc: Specifies a Rect object.

member.desc: Constructs a Rect class object from another Rect object.

argitem.name: width
argitem.desc: Specifies the width of the rectangle. This value can also be retrieved or set via the Rect.width property.

argitem.name: height
argitem.desc: Specifies the height of the rectangle. This value can also be retrieved or set via the Rect.height property.

argitem.name: x
argitem.desc: Specifies the X coordinate of the rectangle. This value can also be retrieved or set via the Rect.left property.

argitem.name: y
argitem.desc: Specifies the Y coordinate of the rectangle. This value can also be retrieved or set via the Rect.topt property.

member.name: addOffset

argitem.name: x
argitem.desc: Specifies the horizontal movement amount of the rectangle.

argitem.name: y
argitem.desc: Specifies the vertical movement amount of the rectangle.

member.desc: Moves the rectangle position. The rectangle moves by the specified x and y values.

member.name: clear
member.desc: Clears each position information of the rectangle to zero.

member.name: set

argitem.name: left
argitem.desc: Specifies the left edge.

argitem.name: top
argitem.desc: Specifies the top edge.

argitem.name: right
argitem.desc: Specifies the right edge.

argitem.name: bottom
argitem.desc: Specifies the bottom edge.

member.desc: Sets the rectangle to the specified size.

member.name: isEmpty
member.shortdesc: Whether the rectangle has an interior
member.desc: Checks whether the rectangle has width and height. Returns true if either is 0 or less.

member.name: clip

argitem.name: r
argitem.desc: Specifies the rectangle object to clip with.

member.desc: Performs clipping of the rectangle with the specified rectangle. Clipping is performed only if the rectangle does not become empty. If it would become empty, false is returned and clipping is not performed.

member.name: union

argitem.name: r
argitem.desc: Specifies the rectangle object to combine.

member.desc: Expands the rectangle with the specified rectangle object. The values of the target rectangle will be the larger values in the direction that expands the rectangle size based on the four-side values of the specified rectangle object. Executed only if the target rectangle is not empty; if it is empty, it is not performed and returns false.

member.name: intersects

argitem.name: r
argitem.desc: Specifies the rectangle object for intersection testing.

member.desc: Determines whether it intersects with the specified rectangle object. Returns true if they intersect.

member.name: included

argitem.name: r
argitem.desc: Specifies the rectangle object for inclusion testing.

member.desc: Determines whether it includes the specified rectangle object. Returns true if it includes it. If even one side is outside, it is determined not to be included.

member.name: includedPos

argitem.name: x
argitem.desc: Specifies the X-axis coordinate value to test.

argitem.name: y
argitem.desc: Specifies the Y-axis coordinate value to test.

member.desc: Determines whether it includes the specified position. Returns true if it includes it. The range is determined excluding right and bottom.

argitem.name: r
argitem.desc: Specifies the rectangle object to test.
